title: e-Sword More Bibles
description:
[Message for niki4 below]

Just &#039;drag-drop&#039; or &#039;copy/paste&#039; these additional Bibles into the e-Sword folder and the next time you use e-Sword they will be listed in the Bible area. Also, the Amplified Bible commentary has been included with red letters linked to the commentary. 

amp.bbl  - Amplified Bible
amp.cmt  - Amplified Bible Commentary
msg.bbl  - The Message Bible
nas+.bbl - New American Standard Bible with Strongs Numbers
nas.bbl  - New American Standard Bible
niv.bbl  - New International Version Bible
nkjv.bbl - New King James Version Bible
nlt.bbl  - New Living Translation Bible

e-Sword is a freeware Bible study software <a href="
http://www.e-sword.net/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.e-sword.net/</a>

[niki4, please consider adding these additional e-Sword Bibles to your &#039;English Bibles.exe&#039;]
